titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a 15-year applicable recovery period for depreciation of electric transmission property.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a 15-year applicable recovery period for depreciation of electric transmission property.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to classify certain electric transmission property as 15-year property for depreciation purposes.
